media:group.media:title: The FAKE "Criminal Investigation" Scam - WARNING
media:group.media:description:
Thanks to MANSCAPED for sponsoring today's video! Get 20% OFF + Free Shipping on your order with my promo code "UPPER" at https://manscaped.com/Upper

In a world of exponentially increasing "internet" and "Social Media" scams... the fake criminal investigation is a new and insidious variant.

Today I would like to examine various different methods of debunking email scams, and take a look at the falsified criminal investigation tactic that is (on the surface) somewhat concerning, but when digging deeper, pathetically hilarious.
